titleStmt.title: A prognostication made for the yeere of our Lord God M.D.LXXXII. Conteyning meete matter for such a worke: gathered out of learned authors, and set downe to profite such as lacke the knowledge thereof. by Thomas Buckmaster
titleStmt.author: Buckminster, Thomas, ca. 1531-1599?

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Watkins and Iames Robertes,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Cum privilegio.
